name: Unum Sanitatis
description:
Unum sanitatis is a platformer Game aiming the saving of the Earth by a Robot.

Why Unum sanitatis ? 

We wanted to be inspired by zoos or existing exhibitions on fauna or flora, which always give a latin name to a living species. In this case, the species present in the game is the planet, which we must save and that's why we called our game "Unum Sanitatis" (which means One health in Latin). 

The robot will be the players that you'll embody throughout this game, your goal is to resolve enigma in order to check the different game levels. 

Each of the levels are about an ecologic problem like global warming, air pollution or overconsumption of electricity. 

The goal is therefore, through the game, to address environmental issues in order to make players aware of the good gestures to adopt to improve the health of the planet.
